description:
This generous umbrella has a sturdy aluminum shaft and wind-baffling fibreglass ribs. Designed by a company headquartered in Vancouver, where they know a thing or two about rain.

  • Made of quick-drying synthetic Pongee umbrella fabric
  • Aluminum shaft and fibreglass ribs combine to make a windproof frame
  • Automatic opening mechanism
  • Length is 84cm. Open diameter is 122cm
name: Vancouver Umbrella Inc Executive Curve Umbrella
